EmailTemplate.name: NPS 90 Day Survey Post Funding
EmailTemplate.subject: RapidAdvance - Post Funding Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on getting funded with RapidAdvance!
Thanks for being a loyal RapidAdvance client!
Now that you’re three months into your financing with us, we’d like to know how everything’s going. Please let us know by filling out this quick survey:
How likely is it that you would recommend RapidAdvance to a friend or colleague?
We’ll keep your answers confidential and won’t share them with another company without your permission.
Sincerely,
The RapidAdvance Team
© 2016 RapidAdvance. All rights reserved.
4500 East West Highway, 6th Floor. Bethesda, MD 20814
